title: Da Hong Pao Oolong
description: Famous rock tea from Wuyi mountains with rich, roasted flavor and woody notes.
longDescription: Da Hong Pao (Big Red Robe) is a legendary oolong tea from the Wuyi Mountains, known for its unique mineral-rich flavor profile. The leaves are hand-picked from ancient trees that grow in rocky cliffs, which impart a distinctive 'rock taste' to the tea. The infusion is deep amber in color with a complex aroma of roasted nuts, caramel, and floral notes. The flavor is rich and full-bodied with a lingering sweetness and a hint of smokiness.
brewingInstructions: Use water at 195°F (90°C). Steep for 3-5 minutes. Can be infused multiple times.

reviews.author: Oolong Aficionado
reviews.comment: This Da Hong Pao is exceptional! The depth of flavor and complexity are unmatched. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: Tea Explorer
reviews.comment: A great representation of Wuyi oolongs. Rich and satisfying with a unique mineral taste.
